myProfile.paragraph1: I am highly skilled in the analysis and development of ABAP coding within ERP systems to provide resolutions to complex customer issues in the Materials Management component area. I am also proficient with SAPUI5, HTML5, Javascript and SQL along with development environments such as SAP Web IDE, Eclipse and Hana Studio.
myProfile.paragraph2: I have a talent for analyzing the technical aspect of customer issues which is pivotal in supporting software that is constantly evolving. It is through this talent I have extensive ability in debugging coding and learning new technologies in a timely manner.
myProfile.paragraph3: Effective communication is also a key asset of mine, including the production of high quality training material to colleagues in a clear concise manner.
